## GasCostEstimator.gasCostOf() method

Estimates the cost of gas in native token of the current chain

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
gasCostOf(fn: keyof TContract["functions"], args: Parameters<TContract["functions"][typeof fn]>): Promise<string>;
```
